summary: It just a simple weapon pack mod.
descriptionHtml:
==================
Requirements:
==================

It don't require anything.

==================
Description:
==================

I'm still some what new to moding so I made this weapon park mod, it the first real mod I ever made and I hope you enjoy it.I plan on making more better weapon when I get more time


==================
Details:
==================

The weapon is in a chest location west from Riften in the water next to a tiny little island. the island have two tree and some rock on it and next to a dock.


==================
Installation:
==================

------------------------------
Manual Instructions
------------------------------

1) Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into your Data folder
2) Make sure the Weapon Park Mod.esp is checked in the Launcher



------------------------------
Nexus Mod Manager Instructions
------------------------------

Installing the Mod

1) Extract the contents of the archive to a temporary folder.
2) Copy the extracted archive to [Install Path]SkyrimNMMMods.
3) Start Nexus Mod Manager
4) Click the Create button
5) Click the Add Archive button, navigate to the archive and select it, then click the Yes button.
6) Click the Create button, wait until it finishes, then click the Ok button.

Activating the Mod

1) Start Nexus Mod Manager
2) Double-click the name of the mod, once installed the mod icon will turn blue.






==================
Un-Installation:
==================

------------------------------
Manual Instructions
------------------------------

1) Delete the files/folders associated with the mod
2) Unheck the Weapon Park Mod.esp in the Launcher

------------------------------
Nexus Mod Manager Instructions
------------------------------

1) Start Nexus Mod Manager
2) Double click the mod to deactivate it, once finished the icon will turn green




==================
Incompatible:
==================

It should be compatible with all other mod.

==================
Changelog:
==================

11/15/2013 - Initial Release

11/17/2013 - Change Vanquish texture


==================
Credits:
==================

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to InsanitySorrow for the ReadMe Generator this ReadMe is based on.



==================
Tools Used:
==================

ReadMe Generator

Creation Kit
Blender
GIMP
Nifskope

==================
Licensing/Legal:
==================

You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of this mod.

If I do not respond within 4 weeks, feel free to do whatever you like with this mod.
author: xXCunningWolfXx
